GE07bhg4c04u:2: imaṃ vivasvate yogaṃ proktavān aham avyayam /
GE07bhg4c04u:8: tad evaṃ brahmārpaṇādi-guṇa-vidhānena tattvaṃ padārtha-vivekādinā ca prapañciṣyan prathamaṃ tāvat parasparāprāptatvena stuvan bhagavān uvāca imam iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:10: imaṃ yogaṃ purāham vivasvata ādityāya kathitavān /

GE07bhg4c04u:14_1: kathitau tathāpi ekaṃ sāṅkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca paśyati sa paśyati [Gītā 5.6] ity anayā
GE07bhg4c04u:14_2: diśā sādhya-sādhanayoḥ phalaikyād aikyam upacarya sādhana-bhūtaṃ karma-yogaṃ sādhya-bhūtaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:14_3: ca jñāna-yogam aneka-vidha-guṇa-vidhānāya stauti vaṃśa-kathanena bhagavān /

GE07bhg4c04u:15_2: ahaṃ bhagavān vāsudevaḥ sarva-jagat-paripālakaḥ sargādi-kāle rājñāṃ balādhānena tad-adhīnaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:16: katham anena balādhānam iti viśeṣeṇena darśayati -- avyayam avyaya-veda-mūlatvād avyaya-phalatvāc ca na vyeti sva-phalād ity avyayam avyabhicāri-phalam /

GE07bhg4c04u:24: adhyāya-dvayenoktaṃ niṣkāma-karma-sādhyaṃ jñāna-yogaṃ stauti imam iti //1//
GE07bhg4c04u:30: pūrvādhyāyābhyām uktaṃ jñāna-yogaṃ karma-yogaṃ caika-phalatvād ekīkṛtya tad-vaṃśaṃ kīrtayan stauti imam iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:32: avyayaṃ nityaṃ vedārtahtvān naveyeti sva-phalādityavyabhicāri-phalatvāc ca /

GE07bhg4c04u:46_0: evam ādityam ārabhya guru-śiṣya-paramparayā prāptam imaṃ yogaṃ rājānaś ca ta ṛṣayaś
GE07bhg4c04u:46_1: ceti rājarṣayaḥ prabhutve sati sūkṣmārtha-nirīkṣaṇa-kṣamā nimi-pramukhāḥ sva-pitrādi-proktaṃ viduḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:47: tasmād anādi-veda-mūlatvenānanta-phalatvenānādi-guru-śiṣya-paramparā-prāptatvena ca kṛtrimatva-śaṅkānāspadatvān mahā-prabhāvo 'yaṃ yoga iti śraddhātiśayāya stūyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:48_0: sa evaṃ mahā-prayojano 'pi yogaḥ kālena mahatā dīrgheṇa dharma-hrāsa-kareṇehedānīm
GE07bhg4c04u:48_1: āvayor vyavahāra-kāle dvāparānte durbalān ajitendriyān anadhikāriṇaḥ prāpya kāma-krodhādibhir
GE07bhg4c04u:49: taṃ vinā puruṣārthāprāpter aho daurbhāgyaṃ lokasyeti śocati bhagavān /
GE07bhg4c04u:51: paraṃ kāma-krodhādi-rūpaṃ śatru-gaṇaṃ śauryeṇa balavatā vivekena tapasā ca bhānur iva tāpayatīti parantapaḥ śatru-tāpano jitendriya ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:55: baladevaḥ : evaṃ vivasvantam ārabhya guru-śiṣya-paramparayā prāptam iimaṃ yogaṃ rājarṣayaḥ sva-pitrādibhir ikṣvāku-prabhṛtibhir upadiṣṭaṃ viduḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:59: sa evāyaṃ mayā te 'dya yogaḥ proktaḥ purātanaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:60: bhakto 'si me sakhā ceti rahasyaṃ hy etad uttamam //3//
GE07bhg4c04u:62: sa evāyaṃ yogo 'dya vicchinne sampradāye sati punaś ca te tubhyam uktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:63: yatas tvaṃ mama bhakto 'si sakhā ca /
GE07bhg4c04u:67: ya evaṃ pūrvam upadiṣṭo 'py adhikārya-bhāvād vicchinna-sampradāyo 'bhūt /
GE07bhg4c04u:68: yaṃ vinā ca puruṣārtho na labhyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:69: sa evāyaṃ purātano 'nādi-guru-paramparā-gato yogo 'dya sampradāya-viccheda-kāle mayātisnigdhena te tubhyaṃ prakarṣeṇoktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:73: yasmāt tvaṃ mama bhaktaḥ śaraṇāgatatve saty atyanta-prītimān sakhā ca samāna-vayāḥ snigdha-sahāyo 'si sarvadā bhavasi atas tubhyam ukta ity arthaḥ anyasmai kuto nocyate tatrāha /
GE07bhg4c04u:74: hi yasmād etaj jñānam uttamaṃ rahasyam atigopyam //3//
GE07bhg4c04u:78: anyas tu arvācīnaṃ praty eva avaktavyatve hetū rahasyam iti //3//
GE07bhg4c04u:79_0: baladevaḥ : sa eva tadānupūrvika-vacana-vācyo yogo mayā tvat-sakhenātisnigdhena te

GE07bhg4c04u:81: hi yasmād uttamaṃ rahasyam iti gopyam etat //3//

GE07bhg4c04u:87: śrīdharaḥ : bhagavato vivasvantaṃ prati yogopadeśāsambhavaṃ paśyann arjuna uvāca aparam iti /

GE07bhg4c04u:92: yā bhagavati vāsudeve manuṣyatvenāsarvajñatvānityatvāśaṅkā mūrkhāṇāṃ tām apanetum anuvadann arjuna āśaṅkate - aparam iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:93: aparam alpa-kālīnam idānantanaṃ vasudeva-gṛhe bhavato janma śarīra-grahaṇaṃ vihīnaṃ ca manuṣyatvāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:94: paraṃ bahu-kālīnaṃ sargādi-bhavam utkṛṣṭaṃ ca devatvāt,
GE07bhg4c04u:100: tvam idānīṃtano manuṣyo 'sarvajñaḥ sargādau pūrvatanāya sarvajñāyādityāya proktavān iti viruddhārtham etad iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:102: etad dehānavacchinnasya tava dehāntarāvacchedena vādityaṃ pratyupadeṣṭṛtvam etad-dehena vā /
GE07bhg4c04u:107: tad uktam abhiyuktaiḥ janmāntarānubhūtaṃ ca na smaryate iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:109: tad evaṃ dehāntareṇa sargādau sad-bhāvānupappattir ity asarvajñatvānityatvābhyāṃ dvāv arjunasya pūrva-pakṣau //4//
GE07bhg4c04u:111: uktam artham asambhavaṃ pṛcchati aparam idānīntanam /
GE07bhg4c04u:112: paraṃ purātanam ataḥ katham etat pratyemīti bhāvaḥ //4//
GE07bhg4c04u:113: baladevaḥ : kṛṣṇasya sanātanatve sārvajñe ca śaṅkamānān anabhijñān nirākartum arjuna uvāca aparam iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:114: aparam arvācīnaṃ paraṃ parācīnaṃ tasmād ādhunikas tvaṃ prācīnāya vivasvate yogam uktavān ity etat katham ahaṃ vijānīyāṃ pratīyām /
GE07bhg4c04u:116: na khalu sarveśvaratvena kṛṣṇam arjuno na vetti tasya narākhya-tad-avatāratvena tādrūpyāt,
GE07bhg4c04u:117: paraṃ dhāma paraṃ dhāma ity ādi tad-ukteś ca /
GE07bhg4c04u:118: na tv atat-sarvajña-viṣayām ajña-śaṅkām apākartum aparam ity ādi pṛcchati /
GE07bhg4c04u:119: sarveśvaraḥ sa yathā sva-tattvaṃ vetti na tathānyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:120: tatas tan-mukhāmbujād eva tad-rūpa-taj-janmādi parkāśanīyaṃ loka-maṅgalāya /
GE07bhg4c04u:121: tad-arthaṃ sva-mahimānaṃ pravadan vikatthanatayā sa nākṣepyaḥ,
GE07bhg4c04u:123: tac ca manuṣākṛti-para-brahmaṇas tava rūpaṃ janmādi ca loka-vilakṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:124: kiṃ-vidhaṃ kim-arthakaṃ kiṃ-kālam iti vijñasyāpy ājñavat praśno 'yam ajña-śaṅkā-nirāsaka-prativacanārthaḥ //4//
GE07bhg4c04u:128: bahūni me vyatītāni janmāni tava cārjuna /
GE07bhg4c04u:129: tāny ahaṃ veda sarvāṇi na tvaṃ vettha parantapa //5//
GE07bhg4c04u:130: śrīdharaḥ : rūpāntareṇopadiṣṭavān ity abhiprāyeṇottaraṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca bahūnīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:133: tvaṃ tu na vettha na vetsi avidyāvṛttatvāt //5//
GE07bhg4c04u:135: tatra sarvajñatvena prathamasya parihāram āha bahūnīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:136: janmāni līlā-deha-grahaṇāni loka-dṛṣṭy-abhiprāyeṇādityasyodayavan me mama bahūni vyatītāni tava cājñāninaḥ karmārjitāni deha-grahaṇāni /
GE07bhg4c04u:137: tava cety upalakṣaṇam itareṣām api jīvānāṃ,
GE07bhg4c04u:141: tāni janmāny ahaṃ sarvajñaḥ sarva-śaktir īśvaro veda jānāmi sarvāṇi madīyāni tvadīyāny anyadīyāni ca /
GE07bhg4c04u:142: na tvam ajño jīvas tirobhūta-jñāna-śaktir vettha na jānāsi svīyāny api kiṃ punaḥ parakīyāṇi /
GE07bhg4c04u:144: paraṃ śatruṃ bheda-dṛṣṭyā parikalpya hantuṃ pravṛtto 'sīti viparīta-darśitatvād bhrānto 'sīti sūcayati /
GE07bhg4c04u:145: tad anena sambodhana-dvayenāvaraṇa-vikṣepau dvāv apy ajñāna-dharmau darśitau
GE07bhg4c04u:149: tava ceti yadā yadaiva mamāvatāras tadā mat-pārṣadatvāt tavāpy āvirbhāvo 'bhūd evety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:151: tvaṃ na vettha mayaiva sva-līlā-siddhy-arthaṃ tvaj-jñānāvaraṇād iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:154_0: baladevaḥ : eka evāhaṃ eko 'pi san bahudhā yo 'vabhāti ity ādi śruty-uktāni nitya-siddhāni
GE07bhg4c04u:154_1: bahūni rūpāṇi vaidūryavad ātmani dadhānaḥ purā rūpāntareṇa taṃ pratyupadiṣṭavān iti
GE07bhg4c04u:155: tava ceti mat-sakhatvāt tāvanti janmāni tavāpy abhūvann ity arthaḥ /

GE07bhg4c04u:161: na ca janmākhyo vikāras tasyāgrima-vyākhyayā pratyākhyānāt //5//
GE07bhg4c04u:164: ajo 'pi sann avyayātmā bhūtānām īśvaro 'pi san /
GE07bhg4c04u:166: śrīdharaḥ : nanu anādes tava kuto janma ?
GE07bhg4c04u:167: avināśinaś ca kathaṃ punar janma yena bahūni me vyatītānity ucyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:168: īśvarasya tava puṇya-pāpa-vihīnasya kathaṃ jīvavaj janmeti ?

GE07bhg4c04u:179_0: nanv atītāneka-janma-vattvam ātmanaḥ smarasi cet tarhi jāti-smaro jīvas tvaṃ para-janma-jñānam
GE07bhg4c04u:179_1: api yoginaḥ sārvātmyābhimānena śāstra-dṛṣṭyā tūpadeśo vāma-devavat [Vs 1.1.30] iti
GE07bhg4c04u:180: tathā cāha vāmadevo jīvo 'pi ahaṃ manur abhavaṃ sūryaś cāhaṃ kakṣīvānṛpir asmi vipraḥity ādi dāśatayyām /
GE07bhg4c04u:182: tathā ca katham ādityaṃ sarvajñam upadiṣṭavān asy anīśvaraḥ san /
GE07bhg4c04u:183: na hi jīvasya mukhyaṃ sārvajñyaṃ sambhavati vyaṣṭy-upādheḥ paricchinnatvena sarva-sambandhitvābhāvāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:184: samaṣṭy-upādher api virājaḥ sthūla-bhūtopādhitvena sūkṣma-bhūta-pariṇāma-viṣayaṃ māyā-pariṇāma-viṣayaṃ ca jñānaṃ na sambhavati /
GE07bhg4c04u:187: tasmād īśvara eva kāraṇopāditvād atītān āgata-vartamāna-sarvārtha-viṣaya-jñānavān mukhyaḥ sarvajñaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:188: atītān āgata-vartamāna-viṣayaṃ māyā-vṛtti-trayam ekaiva vā sarva-viṣayā māyā-vṛttir ity anyat /
GE07bhg4c04u:189: tasya ca nityeśvarasya sarvajñasya dharmādharmādy-abhāvena janmaivānupapannam atītāneka-janmavattvaṃ tu dūrotsāritam eva /
GE07bhg4c04u:190: tathā ca jīvatve sārvajñyānupapattir īśvaratve ca deha-grahaṇānupapattir iti śaṅkā-dvayaṃ pariharann anityatva-pakṣasyāpi parihāram āha ajo 'pīti /

GE07bhg4c04u:196: dharmādharma-vaśatvaṃ cājñasya jīvasaya dehābhimāninaḥ karmādhikāritvād bhavati /
GE07bhg4c04u:197: tatra yad ucyate sarvajñasyeśvarasya sarva-kāraṇasyedṛg-deha-grahaṇaṃ nopapadyata iti tat tathaiva /
GE07bhg4c04u:198: katham ? yadi tasya śarīraṃ sthūla-bhūta-kāryaṃ syāt tadā vyaṣṭi-rūpatve jāgrad-avasthāsmad-ādi-tulyatvam /

GE07bhg4c04u:205: tac-charīrāvacchedena taj-jīvasya bhogābhyupagame 'ntaryāmi-rūpeṇa sarva-śarīra-praveśasya vidyamānatvena śarīra-viśeṣābhyupagama-vaiyarthyāt /

GE07bhg4c04u:210_2: mad-icchayaiva pravartamānā viśuddha-sattva-mayatvena mama mūrtis tad-viśiṣṭasya
GE07bhg4c04u:211: ato 'nena nityenaiva dehena vivasvantaṃ ca tvāṃ ca pratīmaṃ yogam upadiṣṭavān aham ity upapannam /

GE07bhg4c04u:216: tarhi bhautika-vigrahābhāvāt tad-dharma-manuṣyatvādi-pratītiḥ katham iti cet tatrāha ātma-māyayeti /
GE07bhg4c04u:217: man-māyayaiva mayi manuṣyatvādi-pratītir lokānugrahāya na tu vastu-vṛttyeti bhāvaḥ /

GE07bhg4c04u:221: sarva-bhūta-guṇair yuktaṃ kāraṇopādhiṃ māṃ carma-cakṣuṣā draṣṭuṃ nārhasīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:222_0: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā bhāṣyakāreṇa - sa ca bhagavān jñānaiśvarya-śakti-bala-vīrya-tejobhiḥ

GE07bhg4c04u:222_2: īśvaro nitya-śuddha-buddha-mukta-svabhāvo 'pi san sva-māyayā dehavān iva jāta iva
GE07bhg4c04u:222_3: ca lokānugrahaṃ kurvan lakṣyate sva-prayojanābhāve 'pi bhūtānujighṛkṣayā iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:223: vyākhyātṛbhiś coktaṃ svecchā-vinirmitena māyāmayena divyena rūpeṇa sambabhūveti /
GE07bhg4c04u:225: sa eva bhagavad-deha iti bhāṣya-kṛtāṃ matam //
GE07bhg4c04u:226: anye tu parameśvare deha-dehi-bhāvaṃ na manyante /
GE07bhg4c04u:227: kiṃ yaś ca nityo vibhuḥ sac-cid-ānanda-ghano bhagavān vāsudevaḥ paripūrṇo nirguṇaḥ paramātmā sa eva tad-vigraho nānyaḥ kaścid bhautiko māyiko veti /

GE07bhg4c04u:425_0: tad evaṃ tāny ahaṃ veda sarvāṇīty ādinā vidyāvidyopādhibhyāṃ tat-tvaṃ-padārthāv īśvara-jīvau
GE07bhg4c04u:425_2: śuddhasya sataś cid-aṃśena tadaikyam uktam iti draṣṭavyam //10 //
GE07bhg4c04u:427: mām eti so 'rjunety uktaṃ tatra svasya sarva-mukta-prāpyatayā puruṣārthatvam asya mokṣa-mārgasyānādi-parasparāgatatvaṃ ca darśayati vīta-rāgeti /
GE07bhg4c04u:429: sarvān viṣayān parityajya jñāna-mārge kathaṃ jīvitavyam iti trāso bhayam /
GE07bhg4c04u:430: sarva-viṣayocchedako 'yaṃ jñāna-mārgaḥ kathaṃ hitaḥ syād iti dveṣaḥ krodhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:431: ta ete rāga-bhaya-krodhā vītā vivekena vigatā yebhyas te vīta-rāga-bhaya-krodhāḥ śuddha-sattvāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:433: bahavo 'neke jñāna-tapasā jñānam eva tapaḥ sarva-karma-kṣaya-hetutvāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:434: na hi jñānena sadṛśaṃ pavitram iha vidyate iti hi vakṣyati /
GE07bhg4c04u:438: jñāna-tapasā pūtā jīvan-muktāḥ santo mad-bhāvaṃ mad-viṣayaṃ bhāvaṃ raty-ākhyaṃ premāṇam āgatā iti vā /
GE07bhg4c04u:439: teṣāṃ jñānī nitya-yuktā eka-bhaktir viśiṣyate iti hi vakṣyati //10//
GE07bhg4c04u:442: maj-janma-karma-tattva-jñāna-mātreṇaiva māṃ prāpnoty api tu prāktanā api pūrva-pūrva-kalpāvatīrṇasya mama janma-karma-tattva-jñānavanto mām āpur evety āha vīteti /
GE07bhg4c04u:443: jñānam ukta-lakṣaṇaṃ maj-janma-karmaṇos tattvato 'nubhava-rūpam eva tapas tena pūtāḥ iti śrī-rāmānujācārya-caraṇāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:444: yad vā, jñāne maj-janma-karmaṇor nityatva-niścayānubhave yan-nānā-kumata-kutarka-yukti-sarpī-viṣa-dāha-sahana-rūpaṃ tapas tena pūtāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:445: tathā ca śrī-rāmānuja-dhṛta-śrutiḥ - tasya dhīrāḥ parijānanti yoniṃ iti dhīrā dhīmanta eva tasya yoniṃ janma-prakāraṃ jānantīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:446: vītās tyaktāḥ kumata-prajalpiteṣu janeṣu rāgādyā yais te na teṣu rāgaḥ prītir nāpi tebhyo bhayaṃ nāpi teṣu krodho mad-bhaktānām ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:449: baladevaḥ : idānīm iva purāpi maj-janmādi-nityatā-jñānena bahūnāṃ vimuktir abhūd iti tan-nityatāṃ draḍhayitum āha vīteti /
GE07bhg4c04u:450: bahavo janā jñāna-tapasā pūtāḥ santaḥ purā mad-bhāvam āgatā ity anuṣaṅgaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:451_0: maj-janmādi-nityatva-viṣayakaṃ yaj jñānaṃ tad eva duradhigama-śruti-yukti-sampādyatvāt
GE07bhg4c04u:451_1: tapas tasmin jñāne vā yad vividha-kumata-kutarkādi-nivāraṇa-rūpaṃ tapas tena pūtā
GE07bhg4c04u:452: mayi bhāvaṃ premāṇaṃ vidyamānatāṃ vā mat-sākṣāt-kṛtim /
GE07bhg4c04u:454: vītāḥ parityaktās tan-nityatva-virodhiṣu rāgādayo yais te,
GE07bhg4c04u:455: na teṣu rāgaṃ na bhayaṃ na ca krodhaṃ prakāśayantīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:456: tatra hetuḥ - man-mayā mad-eka-niṣṭhā upāśritāḥ saṃsevamānāḥ //10//
GE07bhg4c04u:459: ye yathā māṃ prapadyante tāṃs tathaiva bhajāmy aham /
GE07bhg4c04u:461: śrīdharaḥ : nanu tarhi kiṃ tvayy api vaiṣamyam asti ?
GE07bhg4c04u:462: yad evaṃ tvad-eka-śaraṇānām evātmābhāvaṃ dadāsi nānyeṣāṃ sakāmānām iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:464: yathā yena prakāreṇa sakāmatayā niṣkāmatayā vā ye māṃ bhajante tān ahaṃ tathaiva tad-apekṣita-phala-dānena bhajāmi anugṛhṇāmi,
GE07bhg4c04u:465: na tu sakāmā māṃ vihāyendrādīn eva ye bhajante tān aham upekṣa iti mantavyam /
GE07bhg4c04u:466: yataḥ sarvaśaḥ sarva-prakārair indrādi-sevakā api mamaiva vartma bhajana-mārgam anuvartante /
GE07bhg4c04u:469: nanu ye jñāna-tapasā pūtā niṣkāmās te tvad-bhāvaṃ gacchanti,
GE07bhg4c04u:470: ye tv apūtāḥ sakāmās te na gacchantīti phala-dātus tava vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇye syātām iti nety āha ye yatheti /
GE07bhg4c04u:471_0: ya ārtā arthārthino jijñāsavo jñāninaś ca yathā yena prakāreṇa sakāmatayā niṣkāmatayā
GE07bhg4c04u:471_1: ca mām īśvaraṃ sarva-phala-dātāraṃ prapadyante bhajanti tāṃs tathaiva tad-apekṣita-phala-dānenaiva
GE07bhg4c04u:473: jiijñāsūn vividiṣanti yajñenety ādi-śruti-vihita-niṣkāma-karmānuṣṭhātṝn jñāna-dānena jñāninaś ca mumukṣūn mokṣa-dānena na tv anya-kāmāyānyad dadāmīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:474_0: nanu tathāpi sva-bhaktānām eva phalaṃ dadāsi na tv anya-deva-bhaktānām iti vaiṣamyaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:474_1: sthitam eveti nety āha mama sarvātmano vāsudevasya vartma bhajana-mārgaṃ karma-jñāna-lakṣaṇam
GE07bhg4c04u:474_2: anuvartante he pārtha sarvajñaḥ sarva-prakārair indrādīn apy anuvartamānā manuṣyā
GE07bhg4c04u:475: indraṃ mitraṃ varuṇam agnim āhuḥ ity ādi-mantra-varṇāt phalam ata upapatteḥ [Vs. 3.2.38] iti nyāyāc ca sarva-rūpeṇāpi phala-dātā bhagavān eka evety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:476: tathā ca vakṣyati ye 'py anya-devatā-bhaktā [Gītā 9.23] ity ādi //11//
GE07bhg4c04u:478: nanu tvad-ekānta-bhaktāḥ kilataj-janma-karmaṇor nityatvaṃ manyanta eva /
GE07bhg4c04u:479: kecit tu jñānādi-siddhy-arthaṃ tvāṃ prapannā jñāni-prabhṛtayas tvaj-janma-karmaṇor nityatvaṃ nāpi manyanta iti tatrāha ya iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:480: yathā yena prakāreṇa māṃ prapadyante bhajante aham api tāṃs tenaiva prakāreṇa bhajāmi /
GE07bhg4c04u:482_0: ayam arthaḥ - ye mat-prabhor janma-karmaṇī nitye eveti manasi kurvāṇās tat-tal-līlāyām
GE07bhg4c04u:482_1: eva kṛta-manoratha-viśeṣā māṃ bhajantaḥ sukhayanty aham apīśvaratvāt kartum akartum
GE07bhg4c04u:482_2: anyathā kartum api samarthas teṣām api janma-karmaṇor nityatvaṃ kartuṃ tān sva-pārṣadīkṛtya
GE07bhg4c04u:482_3: taiḥ sārdham eva yathā-samayam avatarann antar dadhānaś ca tān pratikṣaṇam anugṛhṇann
GE07bhg4c04u:483_0: ye jñāni-prabhṛtayo maj-janma-karmaṇor naśvaratvaṃ mad-vigrahasya māyā-mayatvaṃ ca
GE07bhg4c04u:483_1: manyamānā māṃ prapadyante aham api tān punaḥ punar naśvara-janma-karmavato māyā-pāśa-patitān
GE07bhg4c04u:483_2: eva kurvāṇas tat-pratiphalaṃ janma-mṛtyu-duḥkham eva dadāmi /
GE07bhg4c04u:484: ye tu maj-janma-karmaṇor nityatvaṃ mad-vigrahasya ca sac-cid-ānandatvaṃ manyamānā jñāninaḥ sva-jñāna-siddhy-arthaṃ māṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:486: teṣāṃ sva-deha-dvaya-bhaṅgam evecchatāṃ mumukṣūṇām anaśvaraṃ brahmānandam eva sampādayan bhajana-phalam āvidyaka-janma-mṛtyu-dhvaṃsam eva dadāmi /
GE07bhg4c04u:487: tasmān na kevalaṃ mad-bhaktā eva māṃ prapadyante,
GE07bhg4c04u:488_0: api tu sarvaśaḥ sarve 'pi manuṣyā jñāninaḥ karmiṇo yoginaś ca devatāntaropāsakāś
GE07bhg4c04u:488_1: ca mama vartmānuvartante mama sarva-svarūpatvāt jñāna-karmādikaṃ sarvaṃ māmakam eva
GE07bhg4c04u:489: baladevaḥ : nanu nitya-janmādi-manojñaḥ sarveśvaras tvaṃ mayāvagata-kvacittvaṅguṣṭha-mātrādir apīśvaro janmādi-śūnyaḥ śrūyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:490: tat kiṃ tava tvad-upāsanasya ca vaividhyaṃ bhaved iti ced om ity āha ye yatheti /
GE07bhg4c04u:491: ye bhaktā mām ekaṃ vaidūryam iva bahu-rūpaṃ sarveśvaraṃ yathā yena prakāreṇa bhāveneti yāvat prapadyante bhajanti,
GE07bhg4c04u:492: tān ahaṃ tādṛśas tathaiva tad-bhāvānusāriṇā rūpeṇa bhāvena ca bhajāmi sākṣāt bhavann anugṛhṇāmi /
GE07bhg4c04u:494: ato mamaikasyaiva bahu-rūpasya vartma-bahu-vidham upāsana-mārgam anādi-pravṛtta-tad-upāsaka-paramparānukampitā manuṣyāḥ sarve 'nuvartante anusaranti //11//
GE07bhg4c04u:497: kāṅkṣantaḥ karmaṇāṃ siddhiṃ yajanta iha devatāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:498: kṣipraṃ hi mānuṣe loke siddhir bhavati karmajā //12//
GE07bhg4c04u:499: śrīdharaḥ : tarhi mokṣārtham eva kim iti sarve tvāṃ na bhajantīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:501: karmaṇāṃ siddhiṃ karma-phalaṃ kāṅkṣantaḥ prāyeneha mānuṣya-loke indrādi-devatā eva yajante /
GE07bhg4c04u:503: hi yasmāt karmajā siddhiḥ karmajaṃ phalaṃ śīghraṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c04u:507: nanu tvām eva bhagavantaṃ vāsudevaṃ kim iti sarve na prapadyanta iti tatrāha kāṅkṣanta iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:508: karmaṇāṃ siddhiṃ phala-niṣpattiṃ kāṅkṣanta iha loke devatā devān indrāgny-ādyān yajante pūjayanti ajñāna-pratihatatvān na tu niṣkāmāḥ santo māṃ bhagavantaṃ vāsudevam iti śeṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:509: kasmāt ? hi yasmād indrādi-devatā-yājināṃ tat-phala-kāṅkṣiṇāṃ karmajā siddhiḥ karma-janyaṃ phalaṃ kṣipraṃ śīghram eva bhavati mānuṣe loke /
GE07bhg4c04u:510: jñāna-phalaṃ tv antaḥkaraṇa-śuddhi-sāpekṣatvān na kṣipraṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c04u:511: mānuṣe loke karma-phalaṃ śīghraṃ bhavatīti viśeṣaṇād anya-loke 'pi varṇāśrama-dharma-vyatirikta-karma-phala-siddhir bhagavatā sūcitā /
GE07bhg4c04u:512: yatas tat tat kṣudra-phala-siddhy-arthaṃ sa-kāmā mokṣa-vimukhā anyā devatā yajante 'to na mumukṣava iva māṃ vāsudevaṃ sākṣāt te prapadyanta ity arthaḥ //12//
GE07bhg4c04u:514: tatrāpi manuṣyeṣu madhye kāminas tu mama sākṣād-bhūtam api bhakti-mārgaṃ parihāya śīghra-phala-sādhakaṃ karma-vartmaivānuvartanta ity āha kāṅkṣanta iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:516: baladevaḥ : evaṃ prāsaṅgikaṃ procya prakṛtasya niṣkāma-karmaṇo jñānākāratvaṃ vadiṣyaṃs tad anuṣṭhātuṃ viralatvam āha kāṅkṣanta iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:517_0: iha loke 'nādi-bhoga-vāsanā-niyantritāḥ prāṇinaḥ karmaṇāṃ siddhiṃ paśuputrādi-phala-niṣpattiṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:517_1: kāṅkṣanto 'nityālpa-dān apīndrādi-devān yajante sakāmaiḥ karmabhir na tu sarva-deveśvaraṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:517_2: nityānanda-phala-pradam api māṃ niṣkāmais tair yajante /
GE07bhg4c04u:518: hi yasmād asmin mānuṣe loke karmajā siddhiḥ kṣipraṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c04u:519: niṣkāma-karmārādhitān matto jñānato mokṣa-lakṣaṇā siddhis tu cireṇaiva bhavatīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:520: sarve lokā bhoga-vāsanā-grasta-sad-asad-vivekāḥ śīghra-bhogecchavas tad-arthaṃ mad-bhṛtyān devān bhajanti /
GE07bhg4c04u:521: na tu kaścit sad-asad-vivekī saṃsāra-duḥkha-vitrasta-duḥkha-nivṛttaye niṣkāma-karmabhiḥ sarva-deveśaṃ māṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:526: tasya kartāram api māṃ viddhy akartāram avyayam //13//
GE07bhg4c04u:529: tat-kartṛṇā ca brāhmaṇādīnām uttama-madhyamādi-vaicitryaṃ kurvatas tava kathaṃ vaiṣamyaṃ nāsti ?
GE07bhg4c04u:531: catvāro varṇā eveti cāturvarṇyaṃ svārthe ṣyañ-pratyayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:532: ayam arthaḥ -- sattva-pradhānā brāhmaṇās teṣāṃ śama-damādīni karmāṇi /
GE07bhg4c04u:533: sattva- rajaḥ-pradhānāḥ kṣatriyās teṣāṃ śaurya-yuddhādīni karmāṇi /
GE07bhg4c04u:534: rajas- tamaḥ-pradhānā vaiśyās teṣāṃ kṛṣi-vāṇijyādīni karmāṇi /
GE07bhg4c04u:536: ity evaṃ guṇānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca vibhāgaiś cāturvarṇyaṃ mayaiva sṛṣṭam iti satyam,
GE07bhg4c04u:537: tathāpy evaṃ tasya kartāram api phalato 'kartāram eva māṃ viddhi /
GE07bhg4c04u:541: śarīrārambhaka-guṇa-vaiṣamyād api na sarve samāna-svabhāvā ity āha cāturvarṇyam iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:542: catvāro varṇā eva cāturvarṇyaṃ svārthe ṣyañ /
GE07bhg4c04u:543: mayeśvareṇa sṛṣṭam utpāditaṃ guṇa-karma-vibhāgaśo guṇa-vibhāgaśaḥ karma-vibhāgaśaś ca /
GE07bhg4c04u:544: tathā hi sattva-pradhānā brāhmaṇās teṣāṃ ca sāttvikāni śama-damādīni karmāṇi /
GE07bhg4c04u:545: sattvopasarjana-rajaḥ-pradhānāḥ kṣatriyās teṣāṃ ca tādṛśāni śaurya-tejaḥ-prabhṛtīni karmāṇi /
GE07bhg4c04u:546: tama-upasarjana-rajaḥ-pradhānā vaiśyās teṣāṃ ca kṛṣy-ādīni tādṛśāni karmāṇi /
GE07bhg4c04u:547: tamaḥ-pradhānāḥ śūdrās teṣāṃ ca tāmasāni traivarṇika-śuśrūṣādīni karmāṇīti mānuṣe loke vyavasthitāni /
GE07bhg4c04u:548_0: evaṃ tarhi viṣama-svabhāva-cāturvarṇya-sraṣṭṛtena tava vaiṣamyaṃ durvāram ity āśaṅkya
GE07bhg4c04u:548_1: nety āha tasya viṣama-svabhāvasya cāturvarṇyasya vyavahāra-dṛṣṭyā kartāram api māṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:551: karma-mārgas tu bandhaka iti sarva-mārga-sraṣṭari tvayi parameśvare vaiṣamyaṃ prasaktam /
GE07bhg4c04u:552: tatra nahi nahīty āha cāturvarṇyam iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:555: atra sattva-pradhānā brāhmaṇās teṣāṃ śama-damādīni karmāṇi /
GE07bhg4c04u:558: tamaḥ-pradhānāḥ śūdrās teṣāṃ paricaryātmakaṃ karmety evaṃ guṇa-karma-vibhāgaśo guṇānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca vibhāgaiś catvāro varṇā mayā dharma-mārgāśritatvena sṛṣṭāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:559: kintu teṣāṃ kartāraṃ sraṣṭāram api mām akartāram asraṣṭāram eva viddhi /
GE07bhg4c04u:562: sraṣṭāram api māṃ vastutas tv asraṣṭāram /
GE07bhg4c04u:565: sraṣṭṛtve 'pi na sāmyaṃ kiṃcid evety arthaḥ //13//
GE07bhg4c04u:566: baladevaḥ : atha niṣkāma-karmānuṣṭhāna-virodhi-bhoga-vāsanā-vināśa-hetum āha cāturvarṇyam iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c04u:571: tamaḥ-pradhānāḥ śūdrās teṣāṃ viprādi-trika-paricaryādīnīti guṇa-vibhāgaiḥ karma-vibhāgaiś ca vibhaktāś catvāro varṇāḥ sarveśvareṇa mayā sṛṣṭāḥ sthiti-saṃhṛtyor upalakṣaṇam etat /
GE07bhg4c04u:573: yad āha sūtrakāraḥ - janmādy asya yataḥ [Vs 1.1.2] iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:574: tasya sargādeḥ kartāram api māṃ tat tat karmāntaritatvād akartāraṃ viddhīti svasmin vaiṣamyādikaṃ parihṛtam
GE07bhg4c04u:575: / etat prāhāvyayaym iti sraṣṭṛtve 'pi sāmyān na vyemīty arthaḥ //13//
GE07bhg4c04u:578: na māṃ karmāṇi limpanti na me karma-phale spṛhā /
GE07bhg4c04u:579: iti māṃ yo 'bhijānāti karmabhir na sa badhyate //14//
GE07bhg4c04u:580: śrīdharaḥ : tad eva darśayann āha na mām iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:581: karmāṇi viśva-sṛṣṭy-ādīny api māṃ na limpanty āsaktaṃ na kurvanti /
GE07bhg4c04u:584: yataḥ karma-lepa-rahitatvena māṃ yo 'bhijānāti so 'pi karmabhir na badhyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:585: mama nirlepatve kāraṇaṃ nirahaṅkāratva-niḥspṛhatvādikaṃ jānatas tasyāpy ahaṅkārādi-śaithilyāt //14//
GE07bhg4c04u:587: karmāṇi viśva-sargādīni māṃ nirahaṅkāratvena kartṛtvena kartṛtvābhimāna-hīnaṃ bhagavantaṃ na limpanti dehārambhakatvena na badhnanti /
GE07bhg4c04u:588: evaṃ kartṛtvaṃ nirākṛtya bhoktṛtvaṃ nirākaroti na me mamāpta-kāmasya karma-phale spṛhā tṛṣṇā āpta-kāmasya kā spṛhā iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:589: kartṛtvābhimāna-phala-spṛhābhyāṃ hi karmāṇi limpanti tad-abhāvān na māṃ karmāṇi limpantīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:590: evaṃ yo 'nyo 'pi mām akartāram abhoktāraṃ cātmatvenābhijānāti karmabhir na sa badhyate 'kartrātma-jñānena mucyata ity arthaḥ //14//
GE07bhg4c04u:595: tatra kā vārtā ity ata āha na mām iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:596: na limpanti jīvam iva na liptīkurvanti /
GE07bhg4c04u:598: parameśvaratvena svānanda-pūrṇatve 'pi loka-pravartanārtham eva me karmādi-karaṇam iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:600: yas tu na jānāti sa karmabhir badhyata iti bhāvaḥ //14//
GE07bhg4c04u:601: baladevaḥ : etad viśadayati na mām iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:602: karmāṇi viśva-sargādīni māṃ na limpanti vaiṣamyādi-doṣeṇa jīvam iva liptaṃ na kurvanti,

GE07bhg4c04u:625: evam ātmano 'kartuḥ karmālepaṃ jñātvā kṛtaṃ karma pūrvair atikrāntair api asmin yuge yayāti-yadu-prabhṛtibhir mumukṣubhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:626: tasmāt tvam api karmaiva kuru na tūṣṇīm āsanaṃ nāpi saṃnyāsam /

GE07bhg4c04u:631: evambhūtam eva māṃ jñātvā pūrvair janakādibhir api loka-pravartanārtham eva karma kṛtam //15//
GE07bhg4c04u:633: mām eva jñātvā tad-anusāribhir mac-chiṣyaiḥ pūrvair vivasvad-ādibhir mumukṣubhir niṣkāmaṃ karma kṛtam /
GE07bhg4c04u:634: tasmāt tvam api karmaiva tat kuru /
GE07bhg4c04u:636: aśuddha-cittaś cej jñāna-garbhāyai citta-śuddhyai śuddha-cittaś cel loka-saṅgrahāyety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:641: kiṃ karma kim akarmeti kavayo 'py atra mohitāḥ /

GE07bhg4c04u:643: śrīdharaḥ : tac ca tattvavidbhiḥ saha vicārya kartavyam /
GE07bhg4c04u:648: ato yaj jñātā yad-anuṣṭhāyāśubhāt saṃsārān mokṣyase mukto bhaviṣyasi tat karmākarma ca tubhyam ahaṃ pravakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu //16//
GE07bhg4c04u:650: nanu karma-viṣaye kiṃ kaścit saṃśayo 'py asti yena pūrvaiḥ pūrvataraṃ kṛtam ity atinirbadhnāsi ?
GE07bhg4c04u:652_0: nau-sthasya niṣkriyeṣv api taṭastha-vṛkṣeṣu gamana-bhrama-darśanāt tathā dūrāc cakṣuḥ-saṃnikṛṣṭeṣu
GE07bhg4c04u:652_1: gacchatsv api puruṣeṣv agamana-bhrama-darśanāt paramārthataḥ kiṃ karma kiṃ vā paramārthato
GE07bhg4c04u:652_2: 'karmeti kavayo medhāvino 'py atrāsmin viṣaye mohitā mohaṃ nirṇayāsāmarthyaṃ prāptā
GE07bhg4c04u:653: tat tasmāt te tubhyam ahaṃ karma,
GE07bhg4c04u:654: a-kāra-praśleṣeṇa cchedād akarma ca pravakṣyāmi prakarṣeṇa sandehocchedena vakṣyāmi /
GE07bhg4c04u:655: yat karmākarma-svarūpaṃ jñātvā mokṣyase mukto bhaviṣyasy aśubhāt saṃsārāt //16//
GE07bhg4c04u:657: kiṃ ca karmāpi na gatānugatika-nyāyenaiva kevalaṃ vivekinā kartavyam /
GE07bhg4c04u:658: kintu tasya prakāra-viśeṣaṃ jñātvaivety atas tasya prathamaṃ durjñeyatvam āha //16//
GE07bhg4c04u:659: baladevaḥ : nanu kiṃ karma-viṣayakaḥ kaścit sandeho 'py asti yataḥ pūrvaiḥ pūrvataraṃ kṛtam ity atinirbandhād bravīṣīti ced asty evety āha kiṃ karmeti /
GE07bhg4c04u:660: mumukṣubhir anuṣṭheyaṃ karma kiṃ rūpaṃ syād akarma ca karmānyat tad-antargataṃ jñānaṃ ca kiṃ rūpam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:662: atrārthe kavayo dhīmanto 'pi mohitās tad-yāthātmya-nirṇayāsāmarthyān mohaṃ prāpuḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:663: ahaṃ sarveśaḥ sarvajñas te tubhyaṃ tat karma a-kāra-praśleṣād akarma ca pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvānuṣṭhāya prāpya cāśubhāt saṃsārān mokṣyase //16//
GE07bhg4c04u:666: karmaṇo hy api boddhavyaṃ boddhavyaṃ ca vikarmaṇaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:667: akarmaṇaś ca boddhavyaṃ gahanā karmaṇo gatiḥ //17//
GE07bhg4c04u:668: śrīdharaḥ : nanu loka-prasiddham eva karma dehādi-vyāpārātmakam /
GE07bhg4c04u:670: ataḥ katham ucyate kavayo 'py atra mohaṃ prāptā iti ?
GE07bhg4c04u:680: nanu sarva-loka-prasiddhatvād aham evaitaj jānāmi dehendriyādi-vyāpāraḥ karma tūṣṇīm āsanam akarmeti tatra kiṃ tvayā vaktavyam iti tatrāha karmaṇa iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:681: hi yasmāt karmaṇaḥ śāstra-vihitasyāpi tattvaṃ boddhavyam asti,
GE07bhg4c04u:690: tathākarmaṇaḥ karmākaraṇasyāpi sannyāsinaḥ kīdṛśaṃ karmākaraṇaṃ śubhadam iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:691: anyathā niḥśreyasaṃ kathaṃ hasta-gataṃ syād iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:695: baladevaḥ : nanu kavayo 'pi mohaṃ prāpur iti cet tatrāha karmaṇo hīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:696: karmaṇo niṣkāmasya mumukṣubhir anuṣṭhātavyasya svarūpaṃ boddhavyam /
GE07bhg4c04u:698: akarmaṇaś ca karma-bhinnasya jñānasya ca svarūpaṃ boddhavyam /
GE07bhg4c04u:704: karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyed akarmaṇi ca karma yaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:705: sa buddhimān manuṣyeṣu sa yuktaḥ kṛtsna-karma-kṛt //18//
GE07bhg4c04u:706: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ karmādīnāṃ durvijñeyatvaṃ darśayann āha karmaṇīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:707: parameśvarārādhana-lakṣaṇe karmaṇi karma-viṣaye akarma karmedaṃ na bhavatīti yaḥ paśyet /
GE07bhg4c04u:709: akarmaṇi ca vihitākaraṇe karma yaḥ paśyet pratyavāyotpādakatvena bandha-hetutvāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:710: manuṣyeṣu karma kurvāṇeṣu sa buddhimān vyavasāyātmaka-buddhimattvāc chreṣṭhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:714_0: sarvataḥ samplutodaka-sthānīye ca tasmin karmaṇi sarva-karma-phalānām antarbhāvāt
GE07bhg4c04u:714_1: tad evam ārurukṣoḥ karma-yogādhikārāvasthāyāṃ na karmaṇām anārambhād ity ādinokta
GE07bhg4c04u:717: yas tv ātma-ratir eva syād ity ādinā yaḥ karmānupayoga uktas tasyāpy arthāt prapañcaḥ kṛto veditavyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:718: yad ārurukṣor api karma bandhakaṃ na bhavati tad-ārūḍhasya kuto bandhakaṃ syāt ity atrāpi śloko yujyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:719_0: yad vā, karmaṇi dehendriyādi-vyāpāre vartamāne 'py ātmano dehādi-vyatirekānubhavena
GE07bhg4c04u:719_1: akarma svābhāvikaṃ niaṣkarmyam eva yaḥ paśyet tathā akarmaṇi ca jñāna-rahite duḥkha-buddhyā
GE07bhg4c04u:719_2: karmaṇāṃ tyāge karma yaḥ paśyet tasya prayatna-sādhyatvena mithyācāratvāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:721: ya evambhūtaḥ sa tu sarveṣu manuṣyeṣu buddhimān paṇḍitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:722: tatra hetuḥ - yataḥ kṛtsnāni sarvāṇi yadṛcchayā prāptāny āhārādīni karmāṇi kurvann api sa yukta eva akartrātma-jñānena samādhistha evety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:723: anenanaiva jñāninaḥ svabhāvād āpannaṃ kalañja-bhakṣaṇādikaṃ na doṣāya /
GE07bhg4c04u:724: ajñasya tu rāgataḥ kṛtaṃ doṣāya iti vikarmaṇo 'pi tattvaṃ nirūpitaṃ draṣṭavyam //18//
GE07bhg4c04u:726: kīdṛśaṃ tarhi karmādīnāṃ tattvam iti tad āha karmaṇīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:727: karmaṇi dehendriyādi-vyāpāre vihite pratiṣiddhe cāhaṃ karomīti dharmy-adhyāsenātmany āropit## /
GE07bhg4c04u:728: nau-sthenācalatsu taṭastha-vṛkṣādiṣu samāropite calana ivākartātma-svarūpālocanena vastutaḥ karmābhāvaṃ taṭastha-vṛkṣādiṣv iva yaḥ paśyet paśyati /
GE07bhg4c04u:729_0: tathā dehendriyādiṣu triguṇa-māyā-pariṇāmatvena sarvadā savyāpāreṣu nirvyāpāras tūṣṇīṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:729_1: sukham āsa ity abhimānena samāropite 'karmaṇi vyāpāroparame dūrastha-cakṣuḥ-saṃnikṛṣṭa-puruṣeṣu
GE07bhg4c04u:729_2: gacchatsv apy agamana iva sarvadā sa-vyāpāra-dehendriyādi-svarūpa-paryālocanena vastu-gatyā
GE07bhg4c04u:729_3: karma nivṛttyākhya-prayatna-rūpaṃ vyāpāraṃ yaḥ paśyed udāhṛta-puruṣeṣu gamanam iva /
GE07bhg4c04u:732: etādṛśaḥ paramārtha-darśī sa buddhimān ity ādinā buddhimattva-yoga-yuktatva-sarva-karma-kṛttvais tribhir dharmaiḥ stūyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:733: atra prathama-pādena karma-vikarmaṇos tattvaṃ karma-śabdasya vihita-pratiṣiddha-paratvāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:734: dvitīya-pādena cākarmaṇas tattvaṃ darśitam iti draṣṭavyam /
GE07bhg4c04u:735: tatra yat tvaṃ manyase karmaṇo bandha-hetutvāt tūṣṇīm eva mayā sukhena sthātavyam iti tan mṛṣā /
GE07bhg4c04u:736: asati kartṛtvābhimāne vihitasya pratiṣiddhasya vā karmaṇo bandha-hetutvābhāvāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:737: tathā ca vyākhyātaṃ na māṃ karmāṇi limpanti [Gītā 4.14] ity ādinā /
GE07bhg4c04u:738: satica kartṛtvābhimāne tūṣṇīm aham āsa ity audāsīnyābhimānātmakaṃ yat karma tad api bandha-hetur eva vastu-tattvāparijñānāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:739: tasmāt karma-vikarmākarmaṇāṃ tattvam īdṛśaṃ jñātvā vikarmākarmaṇī parityajya kartṛtvābhimāna-phalābhisandhi-hānena vihitaṃ karmaiva kurv ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:740: aparā vyākhyā karmaṇi jñāna-karmaṇi dṛśye jaḍe sad-rūpeṇa sphuraṇa-rūpeṇa cānusyūtaṃ sarva-bhramādhiṣṭhānam akarmāvedyaṃ sva-prakāśa-caitanyaṃ paramārtha-dṛṣṭyā yaḥ paśyet /
GE07bhg4c04u:741: tathākarmaṇi ca sva-prakāśe dṛg-vastuni kalpitaṃ karma dṛśyaṃ māyā-mayaṃ na paramārtha-sat /
GE07bhg4c04u:743: yas tu sarvāṇi bhūtāni ātmany evānupaśyati /
GE07bhg4c04u:746: evaṃ parasparādhyāse 'pi śuddhaṃ vastu yaḥ paśyati manuṣyeṣu madhye sa eva buddhimān nānyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:749: ataḥ sa evāntaḥkaraṇa-śuddhi-sādhana-kṛtsna-karma-kṛd iti vāstava-dharmair eva stūyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:750: yasmād evaṃ tasmāt tvam api paramārtha-darśī bhava tāvataiva kṛtsna-karma-kāritvopapatter ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:751: ato yad uktaṃ yaj jñātvā mokṣyase 'śubhād iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:752: yac coktaṃ karmādīnāṃ tattvaṃ boddhavyam astīti sa buddhimān ity ādi-stutiś ca /
GE07bhg4c04u:755: atattvaṃ cānyan na boddhavyaṃ na vā yaj-jñāne buddhimattvam iti yuktaiva paramārtha-darśināṃ vyākhyā /
GE07bhg4c04u:756: yat tu vyākhyānaṃ karmaṇi nitye parameśvarārthe 'nuṣṭhīyamāne bandha-hetutvābhāvād akarmedam iti yaḥ paśyet /
GE07bhg4c04u:757: tathākarmaṇi ca nitya-karmākaraṇe pratyavāya-hetutvena karmedam iti yaḥ paśyet sa buddhimān ity ādi tad asaṅgatam eva /
GE07bhg4c04u:760: na caitādṛśaṃ mithyā-jñānaṃ boddhavyaṃ tattvaṃ nāpy etādṛśa-jñāne buddhimattvādi-stuty-upapattir bhrāntitvāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:761: nitya-karmānuṣṭhānaṃ hi svarūpato 'ntaḥkaraṇa-śuddhi-dvāropayujyate na tatrākarma-buddhiḥ kutrāpy upayujyate śāstreṇa nāmādiṣu brahma-dṛṣṭivad avihitatvāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:763: evaṃ nitya-karmākaraṇam api svarūpato nitya-karma-viruddha-karma-lakṣakatayopayujyate na tu
GE07bhg4c04u:768: bhāvārthāḥ karma-śabdās tebhyaḥ kriyā pratīyetaiṣa hy artho vidhīyata iti nyāyena bhāvārthasyaivāpūrva-janakatvāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:769: atirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ na gṛhṇāti ity ādāv api saṅkalpa-viśeṣasyaivāpūrva-janakatvābhyupagamāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:771: ato nitya-karmānuṣṭhānārhe kāle tad-viruddhatayā yad-upaveśanādi karma tad eva nitya-karmākaraṇopalakṣitaṃ pratyavāya-hetur iti vaidikānāṃ siddhāntaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:772: ataevākurvan vihitaṃ karmety atra lakṣaṇārthe śatā vyākhyātaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:773: lakṣaṇa-hetvoḥ kriyāyā ity aviśeṣa-smaraṇe 'py atra hetutvānupapatteḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:776_0: nāpi nityānuṣṭhāna-param evaitad vākyaṃ nityāni kuryād ity arthe karmaṇy akarma yaḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:776_1: paśyed ity ādi tad-abodhakaraṃ vākyaṃ prayuñjānasya bhagavataḥ pratārakatvāpatter
GE07bhg4c04u:776_2: ity ādi bhāṣya eva vistareṇa vyākhyātam ity uparamyate //18 //
GE07bhg4c04u:779: śuddhāntaḥ-karaṇasya jñānavattve 'pi janakāder ivākṛta-sannyāsasya karmaṇy anuṣṭhīyamāne niṣkāma-karma-yoge akarma /
GE07bhg4c04u:780: karmedaṃ na bhavatīti yaḥ paśyet tat-karmaṇo bandhakatvābhāvāt iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:781: tathāśuddhāntaḥkaraṇasya jñānābhāve 'pi śāstrajñatvāt jñāna-vāvadūkasya sannyāsino 'karmaṇi karmākaraṇe karma paśyet durgati-prāpakaṃ karma-bandham evopalabhate /
GE07bhg4c04u:784: na tu tasya jñāna-vāvadūkasya jñāni-māninaḥ saṅgenāpi tad-vacasāpi sannyāsaṃ na karotīti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:788: surān ātmānam ātma-sthaṃ nihnute māṃ ca dharma-hā /
GE07bhg4c04u:790: baladevaḥ : karmākarmaṇor boddhavyaṃ svarūpam āha karmaṇīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:791: anuṣṭhīyamāne niṣkāme karmaṇi yo 'karma prastutatvāt karmaṇy ātma-jñānaṃ paśyet,
GE07bhg4c04u:793: etad uktaṃ bhavati - yo mumukṣur hṛd-viśuddhaye kriyamāṇaṃ karmātma-jñānānusandhi-garbhatvāj jñānākāraṃ,
GE07bhg4c04u:794: tac ca jñānaṃ karma-dvārakatvāt karmākāraṃ paśyet /
GE07bhg4c04u:795: ubhayor ekātmoddeśyatvād ubhayam ekaṃ vidyād ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:796: evam eva vakṣyate sāṅkhya-yogau pṛthag bālāḥ ity ādineti /
GE07bhg4c04u:797: evam anuṣṭhīyamāne karmaṇi ātma-yāthātmyaṃ yo 'nusandhatte sa manuṣyeṣu buddhimān paṇḍitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:804: śrīdharaḥ : karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyed ity anena śruty-arthārthāpattibhyāṃ yad uktam artha-dvandvaṃ tad eva spaṣṭayati yasyeti pañcabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:807: tat-saṅkalpena varjitā yasya bhavanti taṃ paṇḍitam āhuḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:808: tatra hetur yatas taiḥ samārambhaiḥ śuddhe citte sati jātena jñānāgninā dagdhāny akarmatāṃ nītāni karmāṇi yasya tam /
GE07bhg4c04u:810: tad-artham idaṃ kartavyam iti kartavya-viṣayaḥ saṅkalpaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:814: tad etat paramārtha-darśinaḥ kartṛtvābhimānābhāvena karmāliptatvaṃ prapañcyate yasya sarva ity ādi brahma-karma-samādhinety antena /

GE07bhg4c04u:1534: ajñaś cāśraddadhānaś ca vinaśyatīti saṃśayātmāpekṣayā nyūnatva-kathanārthaṃ cakārābhyāṃ tayoḥ prayogaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1535: kutaḥ ? saṃśayātmā hi sarvataḥ pāpīyān yato nāyaṃ manuṣya-loko 'sti vittārjanādy-abhāvāt,
GE07bhg4c04u:1537: na sukhaṃ bhojanādi-kṛtaṃ saṃśayātmanaḥ sarvatra sandehākrānta-cittasya /
GE07bhg4c04u:1538: ajñaś cāśraddadhānaś ca paro loko nāsti manuṣya-loko bhojanādi-sukhaṃ ca vartate /
GE07bhg4c04u:1540: tu tritaya-hīnatvena sarvataḥ pāpīyān ity arthaḥ //40//
GE07bhg4c04u:1542: jñānādhikāriṇam uktvā tad-viparītādhikāriṇam āha ajñaś ceti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1544: aśraddadhānaḥ śāstra-jñānavattve 'pi nānā-vādināṃ paraspara-vipratipattiṃ dṛṣṭvā na kvāpi viśvastaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1545: śraddhāvattve 'pi saṃśayātmā mamaitat sidhyen na veti sandehākrānt-matiḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1546: teṣv api madhye saṃśayātmānaṃ viśeṣato nindati nāyam iti //40//
GE07bhg4c04u:1547: baladevaḥ : jñānādhikāriṇaṃ tat-phalaṃ cābhidhāya tad-viparītaṃ tat-phalaṃ cāha ajñaś ceti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1549: aśraddadhānaḥ śāstra-jñāne saty api vivādi-pratipattibhir na kvāpi viśvastaḥ,
GE07bhg4c04u:1550: śraddadhānatve 'pi saṃśayātmā mamaitat siddhyen na veti sandihāna-manā vinaśyati svārthād vicyavate /
GE07bhg4c04u:1551: teṣv api madhye saṃśayātmānaṃ vinindati nāyam iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1552: ayaṃ prākṛto lokaḥ paro 'prākṛtaḥ saṃśayātmanaḥ kiṃcid api sukhaṃ nāsti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1555: tatra sandihānasya kutas tad ity arthaḥ //40//
GE07bhg4c04u:1560: śrīdharaḥ : adhyāya-dvayoktāṃ pūrvāpara-bhūmikā-bhedena karma-jñāna-mayīṃ dvividhāṃ brahma-niṣṭhām upasaṃharati yogeti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c04u:1561: yogena parameśvarārādhana-rūpeṇa tasmin saṃnyastāni karmāṇi yena taṃ karmāṇi sva-phalair na nibadhnanti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1562: tataś ca jñānena ātma-bodhena kartrā saṃchinnaḥ saṃsāro dehādy-atimāna-lakṣaṇo yasya tam ātmavantam apramādinaṃ karmāṇi loka-saṅgrahārthāni svātāvikāni vā na nibadhnanti //41//
GE07bhg4c04u:1564_0: etādṛśaysya sarvānartha-mūlasya saṃśayasya nirākaraṇāyātma-niścayam upāyaṃ vadann
GE07bhg4c04u:1565: yogena bhagavad-ārādhana-lakṣaṇa-samatva-buddhi-rūpeṇa saṃnyastāni bhagavati samarpitāni karmāṇi yena /
GE07bhg4c04u:1566: yad vā paramārtha-darśana-lakṣaṇena yogena saṃnyastāni tyaktāni karmāṇi yena taṃ yoga-saṃnyasta-karmāṇam /
GE07bhg4c04u:1567: saṃśaye sati kathaṃ yoga-saṃnyasta-karmatvam ata āha jñāna-saṃchinna-saṃśayaṃ jñānenātma-niścaya-lakṣaṇena cchinnaḥ saṃśayo yena tam /
GE07bhg4c04u:1568: viṣaya-para-vaśatva-svarūpa-prasāde sati kuto jñānotpattir ity ata āha ātmavantam apramādinaṃ sarvadā sāvadhānam /
GE07bhg4c04u:1570: yoga-saṃnyasta-karmāṇaṃ karmāṇi loka-saṅgrahārthāni vṛthā-ceṣṭā-rūpāṇi vā na nibadhnanti aniṣṭam iṣṭaṃ miśraṃ vā śarīraṃ nārabhante he dhanaṃjaya //41//
GE07bhg4c04u:1572: naiṣkarmyaṃ tv etādṛśasya syād ity āha yogān niṣkāma-karma-yogānantaram eva saṃnyasta-karmāṇaṃ saṃnyāsena tyakta-karmāṇam /
GE07bhg4c04u:1575: baladevaḥ : īdṛśasya naiṣkarmya-lakṣaṇā siddhiḥ syād ity āha yogeti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1576: yogena yoga-sthaḥ kuru karmāṇi ity atroktena saṃnyastāni jñānākāratāpannāni karmāṇi yasya tam /
GE07bhg4c04u:1585: yasmād evaṃ tasmād ātmano 'jñānena saṃbhūtaṃ hṛdi-sthitam enaṃ saṃśayaṃ śokādi-nimittaṃ dehātma-viveka-khaḍgena chittvā paramātma-jñānopāya-bhūtaṃ karma-yogam ātiṣṭhāśraya /
GE07bhg4c04u:1587: he bhārateti kṣatriyatvena yuddhasya dharmatvaṃ darśitam //42//
GE07bhg4c04u:1589: niṣṭhoktā yena taṃ vande śauriṃ saṃśaya-saṃchidam //
GE07bhg4c04u:1593: tasmād ajñāna-saṃbhūtaṃ hṛt-sthaṃ jñānāsinātmanaḥ chittvainaṃ saṃśayaṃ yogam ātiṣṭhottiṣṭha bhārata //42//
GE07bhg4c04u:1598: hṛt-sthaṃ hṛd-gataṃ saṃśayaṃ chittvā yogaṃ niṣkāma-karma-yogam ātiṣṭhāśraya /
GE07bhg4c04u:1603: gītāsv ayaṃ caturtho hi saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām //4//
GE07bhg4c04u:1605: hṛt-sthaṃ hṛd-gatam ātma-viṣayakaṃ saṃśayaṃ mad-upadiṣṭena jñānāsinā chittvā yogaṃ niṣkāmaṃ karma mayopadiṣṭam ātiṣṭha /
GE07bhg4c04u:1607: dvy-aṃśakaṃ dhānyavat karma tuṣāṃśād iva taṇḍulaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1608: śreṣṭhaṃ dravyāṃśato jñānam iti turyasya nirṇayaḥ //4//
